        Description copied from interface: LucModule
        Get term for ID field to search one single doc. Module should create term by using field name as first parameter in term constructor and value of that field retrieved from item as second parameters TODO need refactoring: probably it is better to get ID value from module and build Term object in LuceneWorker?
